thread.title: Journey to Un'Goro Card Reveal Livestream
thread.title_full: Journey to Un'Goro Card Reveal Livestream

author: Fluxflashor
title: Journey to Un'Goro Card Reveal Livestream
text:
254 Journey to Un'Goro Card Reveal Livestream 
It's finally here ! The first ever Un'Goro card reveal livestream revealed 11 new cards to us from the upcoming expansion. Peter Whalen of the Hearthstone team and all-around-awesome-person Sean "Day[9]" Plott were on stream to present and talk about the cards. More cards will be shown starting next week. They confirmed some cards will be shown at the HCT Bahamas event. Quest cards can be counterspelled . Nether Portal does indeed spawn an imp every turn! Un'Goro Pack via Elise the Trailblazer doesn't mimic in-game packs. It has better chances for Legendaries and gives a guaranteed epic. 
Follow us on Twitter to get notified of new cards immediately! New Cards
